roleset.name: assign culpability

example.name: active, arg1 as DO
example.text: The company blamed a number of factors for the earnings decline , including softer sales of joint - implants .

propbank.arg: including softer sales of joint - implants

example.name: passivized arg1
example.text: Uncertainty about the prospects for further action to curtail stock - index arbitrage , a form of program trading blamed for recent volatility in the market , also contributed to its lack of direction , Mr. Puccio said .

propbank.arg: for recent volatility in the market

example.name: active, arg2 as DO
example.text: And some carriers are facing other unexpected headaches : USAir , for example , blamed some of its loss on merger expenses and on disruptions caused by Hurricane Hugo last month .

propbank.arg: on disruptions caused by Hurricane Hugo last month

example.name: passivized arg2
example.text: Much of the instability in stock prices lately has been blamed on arbitrage trading , designed to profit from differences in prices between stocks and index futures .

propbank.arg: Much of the instability in stock prices
on arbitrage trading , designed to profit from differences in prices between stocks and index futures

example.name: deciding case?
example.text: Fina blamed lower chemical prices , reduced gasoline margins and refinery maintenance shutdowns .

propbank.arg: lower chemical prices , reduced gasoline margins and refinery maintenance shutdowns

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: In an Oct. 10 editorial - page article , `` It 's the World Bank 's Turn to Adjust , '' Paul Craig Roberts lays most of the blame for what ails developing countries at the doorstep of the World Bank .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: So one of you will ask me , `` If God controls what we do , why does he blame us for our sins ? ''

example.name: Another All Arguments
example.text: Reporters are questioning the governor 's blame of the scandal on a staff member .

roleset.note: BLAME-V NOTES: The last example seems to leave aside the 'reason' argument, leadingme to believe that should be arg2. But it's pretty much a tossupeither way. (from blame.01-v)
BLAME-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry blame.01, OntoNotes grouping blame-n senses 1 & 2; maps to VN class judgement-33. Framed by Claire. (from blame.01-n)
